適合性: (てきごうせい) - compatibility; conformance; fitness; adaptability
適合性ログ: (てきごうせいログ) - conformance log
適合性文書: (てきごうせいぶんしょ) - conformance document
適合性解決試験: (てきごうせいかいけつしけん) - conformance resolution tests
適合性評価過程: (てきごうせいひょうかかてい) - conformance assessment process
適合性試験: (てきごうせいしけん) - conformance testing
適合検査試験: (てきごうけんさしけん) - conformance test
適合率: (てきごうりつ) - precision; precision ratio; relevance factor; relevance ratio
適合規格: (てきごうきかく) - compatible specification; compatible standards; conformity standards
適合ＳＧＭＬ応用: (てきごうエスジーエムエルおうよう) - conforming SGML application
適合ＳＧＭＬ文書: (てきごうエスジーエムエルぶんしょ) - conforming SGML document
適宜: (tekigi) - adequado, apropriado, conveniente, correto; adequadamente, de acordo, conforme necessário, a critério de alguém
適当: (tekitou) - adequado, correto, apropriado, suficiente, apto, justo; superficial, displicente, descuidado, preguiçoso, desleixado, não comprometido, pouco confiável, irresponsável
適役: (てきやく) - suitable post or role
適応デルタ変調: (てきおうデルタへんちょう) - Adaptive Delta Modulation
適応制御系: (てきおうせいぎょけい) - adaptive control system
適応力: (てきおうりょく) - adaptability; capacity to adapt; ability to adjust
適応変換符号化: (てきおうへんかんふごうか) - Adaptive Transform Coding; ATC
適応性: (てきおうせい) - adaptability; flexibility; malleability
適応放散: (てきおうほうさん) - adaptive radiation
適応症: (てきおうしょう) - diseases for which a particular medicine is indicated
適応的差分パルス符号変調: (てきおうてきさぶんパルスふごうへんちょう) - adaptive differential pulse-code modulation; adaptive DPCM; ADPCM
適応的期待: (てきおうてききたい) - adaptive expectations
適期: (てきき) - proper time (e.g. for harvesting rice); appropriate time; right time
適材: (てきざい) - man fit for the post; right person
適材適所: (てきざいてきしょ) - (yoji) the right person in the right place
適格者: (てきかくしゃ) - qualified or eligible person
適正価格: (てきせいかかく) - fair or reasonable price
適正利潤: (てきせいりじゅん) - reasonable profit
適正表示状態: (てきせいひょうじじょうたい) - visually correct
適法性: (てきほうせい) - legality; lawfulness; legitimacy
適法手続: (てきほうてつづき) - due process
適温: (てきおん) - suitable or moderate temperature
適潤: (てきじゅん) - suitably damp; adequately wet (e.g. for plants)
適用分野: (てきようぶんや) - field of application
適用業務ソフトウェア: (てきようぎょうむソフトウェア) - application software
適用業務ソフトウェアプログラム: (てきようぎょうむソフトウェアプログラム) - application software program
適用業務プログラム: (てきようぎょうむプログラム) - application software
適用業務問題: (てきようぎょうむもんだい) - application problem
適用業務責任分散型トランザクション: (てきようぎょうむせきにんぶんさんがたトランザクション) - application-supported distributed transaction
適用範囲: (てきようはんい) - range of use; range of application; range of applications; scope (of a document)
適用除外: (てきようじょがい) - exemption (e.g. from application of a law); exclusion
適確: (てっかく) - precise; accurate; appropriate; exactly the right
適者: (てきしゃ) - suitable person; fit person; the fit
適者生存: (てきしゃせいぞん) - (yoji) survival of the fittest
適薬: (てきやく) - specific medicine or remedy
適訳: (てきやく) - proper or suitable translation; exact rendering
適語: (てきご) - appropriate word; apt word or expression; mot juste
適量: (てきりょう) - proper quantity; proper dose; optimal dose
適齢期: (てきれいき) - suitable age (esp. for marriage); marriageable age
遭う: (あう) - (逢う is often used for close friends, etc. and may be associated with drama or pathos; 遭う may have an undesirable nuance) to meet/to encounter/to see; (esp. 遭う when in kanji) to have an accident/to have a bad experience
遭す: (あわす) - to make (someone) to meet/to let (someone) meet; to expose to/to subject to
遭わす: (あわす) - to make (someone) to meet/to let (someone) meet; to expose to/to subject to
遭わせる: (あわせる) - to make (someone) to meet/to let (someone) meet; to expose to/to subject to
遭遇: (souguu) - encounter, being confronted with (por exemplo, dificuldade), meeting with (e.g. accident)
遭遇戦: (そうぐうせん) - encounter; engagement; battle
遭遇説: (そうぐうせつ) - tidal hypothesis (of the origin of the solar system); near-collision hypothesis
遭難信号: (そうなんしんごう) - distress signal; SOS
遭難救助隊: (そうなんきゅうじょたい) - rescue party
遭難死: (そうなんし) - accidental death (esp. while climbing mountains or being shipwrecked)
遭難者: (そうなんしゃ) - victim; survivor; sufferer
遭難船: (そうなんせん) - wrecked ship; ship in distress
遮へい: (しゃへい) - screen; shielding; reverse clipping
遮る: (saegiru) - to interrupt, to obstruct (uma opinião, o jeito de alguém, etc.), to block (light, wind, etc.), to intercept, to cut off
遮二無二: (しゃにむに) - (yoji) desperately; recklessly; rush headlong
遮光カーテン: (しゃこうカーテン) - lined curtain; opaque curtain
遮光器土偶: (しゃこうきどぐう) - "spaceman" clay figurine from about 500 AD
遮光幕: (しゃっこうまく) - blackout curtain; lampshade; shade
遮断: (shadan) - isolamento, corte, bloqueio, quarentena, interceptação, privação
